name: Reaction Ralley
description:
This is a quick game I made in less than 24 hours. It's nothing special just a little game to test your reaction time and train your aim. As of now there probably won't be any updates to the game unless said otherwise. To hear about upcoming updates join the discord at https://discord.gg/yV3yHezTPD 

**when your in game if you want to go back to the menu hit escape on your keyboard**
